nodes.text: Star Wars: Droids: Artoo's Day Out
Droids: Artoo's Day Out is an 8-page comic written by Ryder Windham from Star Wars Galaxy Magazine 1 which was published by Topps in Fall 1994.

C-3PO, under the ownership of Baron Pitareeze, assists the Baron as a translator for his business negotiations, leaving R2-D2 behind to watch the landspeeder. During this time, R2 is stolen by spice smugglers and transported off-planet. However, the ship is interrupted by a heavily-armed security ship, at which point R2 gets into a lifepod and zooms back to the planet's surface, just in time to meet with Pitareeze and Threepio as if nothing ever happened.
